articles.author: Eric Sylvers
articles.title: Fake Covid Vaccination Cards Are on the Rise in the U.S., Europe - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Vaccine mandates have fueled an increase in demand for fraudulent certificates as sellers flourish online
articles.content:
MILANAs Covid-19 vaccine mandates proliferate in the U.S. and Europe, so are swindlers selling bogus vaccination certificates.
